Slaski:
Magmeld - world of fairies, but there are not only the Fairy and Cats. Fairy Goddess worshiped before Einhasad, but once betrayed her, and opposed to the will of the gods, for which he had been locked forever beyond our reality ... Beings, ruled by gods, fairies and distraught ... A lot going on in Magmelde and Cats got nothing to do with it!
Ask what should be done to find out the truth about all this.
